About Us

Upward Financial Services, LLC was founded by Judd Anicette in 2019. Judd and Upward Financial Services professionals specializes in accounting, bookkeeping, tax services and litigation.

Judd Anicette is a certified Enrolled Agent with the I.R.S. and has an extensive accounting background in multiple industries. Judd and his colleagues at Upward Financial Services serves high net worth individuals, families, and multiple businesses.

Upward Financial Services takes pride in providing customers with their financial needs to meet their financial goals.
